creator: American Searches, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
What is American Searches?
---------------------------------------------
Explore BOTH Sides of the Story… One Search at a Time! With today’s modern media there is no single news source that people from ALL political backgrounds trust to consistently and accurately present both sides of every story. So, AmericanSearches conveniently displays balanced search results from BOTH Left-Leaning and Right-Leaning online sources (each clearly labeled as either a ‘Blue’ or ‘Red’ source) on one page. You also have the option of viewing Google search results for the same search term by simply clicking on an adjacent tab. Finally, if you’re interested in viewing search results from ONLY one perspective or the other, adjacent results tabs from either ‘Left-leaning’ or ‘Right-leaning’ sources are also available (without conducting another search for the same key words)!


Do I have to pay to use it?
-----------------------------------------
No, American Searches is provided as a free Public Service for those who are interested in preserving convenient access to – and awareness of – BOTH sides of every story or current event.


How does it work?
------------------------------
American Searches displays a balanced set of the top search results from the most popular Left-Leaning and Right-Leaning online sources (each clearly labeled with either a Blue (Left-leaning) or Red (Right-leaning) mark. In short, you’re essentially forcing the media to show you BOTH sides of the story… One Search at a time! If you just want to run a quick search for Google results, simply click on the adjacent ‘Google’ tab (no need to type in the search terms again!). ‘Left-leaning’ and ‘Right-leaning’ results tabs are also available from the most popular online sources if you would like to view just one viewpoint at a time.

This search engine is offered as a free Public Service to help bring the balanced voice of reason back to the American conversation. Enjoy!
